channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Marauders
channel.desc: When Hubert National Bank is hit by a heist conducted by four thieves, an FBI Special Agent's team is called upon to investigate. Strangely, the evidence leads to the owner and his clients.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Chang'An Fog Monster
channel.desc: When a mysterious fog containing monsters engulfs a city, a prince and his guard get caught in its midst. The latter must find a way to protect the royalty and the people.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Midway
channel.desc: Leaders and soldiers of the US Navy put their mettle and resilience to test in order to defeat the Japanese forces in the Battle of Midway.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Please Stand By
channel.desc: Wendy, a young woman with autism, runs away from her caregiver and embarks on a journey of a lifetime in order to submit her manuscript to a screenwriting competition.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days
channel.desc: Stella Olemaun moves to Los Angeles to create awareness about vampires, but soon becomes the target of the local blood-thirsty demons. She decides to face them and avenge her husband's death.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vanguard
channel.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Dead In A Week: Or Your Money Back
channel.desc: Leslie, an elderly assassin, attempts to do some business at suicide spots. After an encounter with a struggling writer, he makes an unusual deal with him.
